urlInput.placeholder: Please enter the URL of YouTube video.

about.title: About this web site
about.description1: This site can display subtitles for your favorite YouTube videos.
about.description2: Then, if there is a word in the subtitle whose meaning you do not understand, you can immediately search for it in the WebLio dictionary.
about.description3: Click on a word in the subtitle and the word will be copied into the search field.

validation.isYoutubeUrl: Please enter the URL of the YouTube video.
